oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plant breeding for organic farming: current status and problems in Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Legzdina, Linda
Skrabule, Ilze
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Compendium is a part of Deliverable 4 of 6th FP SSA project “Environmental friendly food production system: requirements for plant breeding and seed production” (ENVIRFOOD) and contains information about current status and problems in EU regarding to organic plant breeding.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Legzdina, Linda and Skrabule, Ilze (2005) Plant breeding for organic farming: current status and problems in Europe. State Stende Plant Breeding station.
